name: fiscal-year-calendar
title: Microsoft & GitHub Fiscal Year Calendar
description: Struggle to tell your Zinc from your FY23H2? Ever wonder if January is Q1 or Q3? This extension is for you!
author: hmarr

commands.name: index
commands.title: Fiscal Year Calendar
commands.subtitle: Translate normal dates to FYs, Qs, and Semesters
commands.description: See the where we are in Microsoft & GitHub's fiscal calendar
